title: Duterte's method is our best option in fighting illegal drugs, crime and corruption in the PH
content:
Doing nothing in the current situation of the Philippines or doing the same thing the previous administrations did is much worse as we've seen the result. The result is high crime rate, proliferation of drugs, rampant corruption and death of innocent lives.

If you don't agree with Duterte's method, then what is the better method?
